article_title: Can You Believe This? Republican Congress Gives IRS More Power

article_metadata.description: WHAT IN THE WORLD were congressional Republicans thinking when, in authorizing the recent highway bill, they let pass a provision that gives more power to the IRS? This most-feared government agency can now have your passport revoked or not renewed by certifying to the State Department that you are "seriously [...]
